title: Bug 7752: Export multiple files with the same file name under different directories to a zip file fails.
description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Launch WSWB and create two projects.
2. Under each project, create a new file with the same name (e.g., 'foo.txt').
3. From the main menu, select 'File' > 'Export' and choose 'Zip File' to export.

Observed Behavior:
When creating files with the same name under different directories in two projects (e.g., 'foo.txt' in project 1 and 'foo.txt' in project 2), the export to zip file fails.

Expected Behavior:
The zip file should be able to store files with the same name under different directories.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Launch WSWB and create two projects.
2. Under each project, create a new file with the same name (e.g., 'foo.txt').
3. From the main menu, select 'File' > 'Export' and choose 'Zip File' to export the projects containing the files with the same name.
